channel.title: Getting more players
channel.description: Ok, so, I have 50$ atm and i'm planning to buy a vps, a paid domain, and a new forum. I also would like to find somewhere I can pay to get more players. Where should I get a vps, paid domain, and new forum? And how much would this cost.. Also where would I find somewhere to pay to get players?

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Uhmm I think you’ll be best of at www.nlvl.net its really cheap and is really loed by its customers, read the vouces

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

nicke924:

Pretty sure you can get a VBulletin forum for under 50$. Or you could get some contacts that offers for a reasonable price.

Under 50$ but I can’t waste 3/4 of the money on it then theres none for anything else. I am going to use vpsland for a vps, and idk what for the domain.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @anthonyduka anthonyduka
item.description:
@anthonyduka wrote:

Just buy a 12 month domain off godaddy for 12$, and pay 5.00/month for webhosting, you can put your forums on their for free, and for the vps, go to http://www.vpsland.com/ and buy the 20$ package.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Pretty sure you can get a VBulletin forum for under 50$. Or you could get some contacts that offers for a reasonable price.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

I am playing around with Ucoz now, it seems like… well honestly it’s the best free forum I have ever seen!

I would go for that one.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

theres always ucoz!

ucoz.net that is.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

There is always http://www.forumotion.com/, it is one of the better free forums in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Yeahh… I can’t afford a vbulletin, but someone told me something about a playershare thing that is 1$ per 20mins and he said he payed 31$ on it and got 88 players. What other forums are there to make? I will use vpsland.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

[quote=“nicke924, post:3, topic:403257”][quote author=yo dude 1345 link=topic=500315.msg3658906#msg3658906 date=1310223775]
well, I can make you a forum fully working and then sign it over to you for free, Also I would suggest VPSLand for the vps. It will probably take me an hour to completely make the forum and all its sections and this forum can hold large files and webclients and everything. You can add a domain to this forum as well if you wanted. So now I guess the question is, Do you want a free forum that is preset and modernized to your liking?
[/quote]
Or he could just buy a new vBulletin?
Domain at hostgator , Recommended by me.
Vps at VPSLand.
Vbulletin forums.[/quote]
Yes but, isn’t vBulletin over $150, therefore he can’t get it? lol …

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

It always happens. You make an awesome server, get forums, webclient, maybe even highscores, and what not, but you don’t have a single player to play this great server. If you are willing to pay for players, well then you will be very delighted of what you can do. You can pay MITB to get a spot in the sponsored servers list, and put all your features in, and the sponsored servers are what people play all the time. Make sure you have some good detail and actually attract your player to the game.

And the other great things, that nicke924 mentioned.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting more players
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

yo dude 1345:

well, I can make you a forum fully working and then sign it over to you for free, Also I would suggest VPSLand for the vps. It will probably take me an hour to completely make the forum and all its sections and this forum can hold large files and webclients and everything. You can add a domain to this forum as well if you wanted. So now I guess the question is, Do you want a free forum that is preset and modernized to your liking?

Or he could just buy a new vBulletin?
Domain at hostgator , Recommended by me.
Vps at VPSLand.
Vbulletin forums.

Read full topic
